description: Take every 5th term of Padovan sequence A000931.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (5,-4,1).
prog: (Sage) taylor( mul((1-x)/(1-(1-x^2)-(1-x^3)) for i in xrange(1,2)),x,1,22)# _Zerinvary Lajos_, Jun 02 2009(MAGMA) I:=[0, 1, 5 ]; [n le 3 select I[n] else 5*Self(n-1)-4*Self(n-2)+Self(n-3): n in [1..40]]; // Vincenzo Librandi, Feb 03 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Initial term 0 added by _Colin Barker_, Feb 03 2012
